biotools.summary: Attention Guided Deformation Network (AGDN) utilizes attention maps to localize and zoom in lesion regions, thus enabling better inspection in order to make better diagnosis of the small lesions in WCE images.

bioschemas.name: WCE-AGDN
bioschemas.summary: Attention Guided Deformation Network (AGDN) utilizes attention maps to localize and zoom in lesion regions, thus enabling better inspection in order to make better diagnosis of the small lesions in WCE images.
